question: ”I have decided to bring this marriage to an end. I am therefore giving one Raj’i talaq”
answer:
QUESTION

please explain me what is the meaning of
i have decieded to bring this marriage to an end. i am therefore giving one RAJ i TALAQ

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

If a person says:

”I have decided to bring this marriage to an end. I am therefore giving one Raj’i talaq”

Then one revocable divorce will take place. That means the couple can reconcile during the iddat period without having to renew the nikah. 

Hashiya Ibn Abdin 3\247

And Allah knows best

Wassalam u Alaikum
